title: i was in court 12-06-07 and was awarded money. when am i going to recieve these funds. i also claimed movie right`s and want to get started. my copyright  donald k roche`s l5h has a supplement called   the night he went down the stairs. does the star know who signed my name that shouln`t have? it was in court in wilmington.
text:
You need to call the courthouse, reference your case and speak to
someone there. Court officials will be able to answer all your
questions.
